QuestData.Title: Falling With Style
QuestData.Description:
<Kua'fon looks to the kite, then back at you. He looks to the kite again, poking his head forward deliberately. He slowly pans his gaze back to you.>
Skree.
<Time for another flight!>
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Kua'fon on another flight on the Huge Dragon Kite.
